response.summary:
Electrical engineer with knowledge and skills to develop tasks in professional areas such as the management and control of energy processes, design of electrical installations and lighting, as well as planning and operation of systems for generation, transmission and distribution of electricity.
I have experience in the management of industrial administrative processes and in protective devices coordination and electric arc studies . I have also been involved in the development of tests for the operation of variable speed drives, as well as for the design of high voltage electrical protections.
response.skills: Leadership, Management, Organizational Leadership, Invoice Processing, Project Management, Project Planning, Project Coordination, Customer Service, Customer Relationship Management (CRM), Negotiation, Sales Management, Business Development, Equities, Creativity and Innovation, engineering, Lotus Notes, Microsoft Office, Microsoft Excel, Microsoft Word, Microsoft PowerPoint

profile_positions.description:
Know the products and services offered and the prices. 
Meet sales objectives through the identification of customer needs and the implementation of new commercial and distribution channels. 
Contribute to maintaining and improving the corporate image and the relationship with customers.
Define business strategies and actions.
Manage, organize and supervise the technical and human resources available to meet sales objectives.
profile_positions.title: Commercial and Business Leader

profile_positions.description:
Project execution planning. 
Management of company resources for the correct execution of projects. 
Management of communication between employees, company and clients for the proper functioning of the company and the correct execution of the projects.
profile_positions.title: Chief Operating Officer

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for the execution of projects in the field of electrical engineering, specifically in basic and detailed engineering.
Short-circuit studies.
Device coordination studies.
Arc flash analysis. 
Equipotentiality and grounding systems studies. 
Power quality analysis.
Surveys, measurements, inspections and tests.
Making commercial offers and support in administrative activities.
profile_positions.title: Lead Project Engineer

profile_positions.description:
Support in the execution of projects in the field of electrical engineering, specifically in basic and detailed engineering.

Device coordination studies.
Arc flash analysis.

profile_positions.title: Assistant Engineer

profile_positions.description: Logistical and organizational support during the Devices Coordination in power systems  course.
profile_positions.title: Administrative Assistant

profile_positions.description: Support as a Technical Specialist in the audit of the management system of the audited companies.
profile_positions.title: Technical Specialist

profile_positions.description: Development of material and module related to the interpretation of NTC 2050, within the Technical Standards Course for SENA instructors.
profile_positions.title: Tutor

profile_positions.description:
Support to the project's leading engineer in the DIGSILENT and ATP simulations of the Codensa network and in the technical studies necessary for the development of the project, related to:
Analysis of ferroresonance, analysis of single-phase faults, analysis of overvoltages, analysis of safety of people, technical specifications of the equipment to be installed on the network, economic analysis of the results obtained.
profile_positions.title: Electrical Engineer

profile_positions.description:
Management and follow up of requests for guarantees. 
Control of invoicing .
Logistics for the provision of services.
Follow-up to authorized workshops.
Stock and tool control.

profile_positions.description:
Dielectric studies in high voltage circuit breakers.
Thermal studies in high voltage circuit breakers.
Development of methodology for conducting dielectric and thermal studies in high voltage circuit breakers, based on the use of COMSOL Multiphysics.
profile_positions.title: Interim Engineering Intern

company.name: AM4 Ingeniería
company.description: We are a company committed to meeting the needs of our customers by providing optimal solutions with quality and confidence that provide them with new opportunities and contribute to their development in a sustainable way. We provide specialized engineering solutions in the electrical sector, through our Study, Design, Assembly and Training services.
